pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixed Proportional Hazard Competing Risk Model // Estimation of piecewise constant mixed proportional hazard competing risk model with NPMLE. The model is described in S. Gaure et al. (2007) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2007.01.015, J. Heckman and B. Singer (1984) doi:10.2307/1911491, and B.G. Lindsay (1983) doi:10.1214/aos/1176346059.
